pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Mobile DropdownMobile Dropdown is a Dash component library.Dropdown component for smartphones.### Installation*** $ pip install mobile_dropdown### Properties***- id (string)- className (string)- options (array) - label (string; require) - value (string | int; require)- value (string | int)- notfoundMsg (string; default: "No results found") Message when no choice exists.- clearable (bool) Do you want to have Dropdown cleared?
